text:
@NYGovCuomo Under the latest standard, @Twitter should add a fact-check label to the Governor's tweet because according to the WHO, healthy people should wear masks only if caring for coronavirus patients ( https://t.co/OLAWhKccyx )

But that's ok if Twitter has a double standard.
